snippet: Kyp Malone, Tunde Adebimpe and Mavis Staples are among those who will take part in a tribute to Curtis Mayfield at the Lincoln Center Festival in July.
abstract: Kyp Malone, Tunde Adebimpe and Mavis Staples are among those who will take part in a tribute to Curtis Mayfield at the Lincoln Center Festival in July.

headline.main: Lineup Coming Together for Tribute to Curtis Mayfield
headline.print_headline: Lineup Coming Together For Tribute to Mayfield
